Class Primes

public final class Primes
extends java.lang.Object

Provides an array of prime numbers optimized for hash tables

Method Detail

next

public static final int next(int n)
Searches a prime number that is equal to or larger than the given number

Parameters:
n - the number
Returns:
the prime number

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
This method has been used to calculate the array of prime numbers. It reads in a file created by primegen-0.97 (http://cr.yp.to/primegen.html). primegen uses the Sieve of Atkin and is hence quite fast. The file should contain all prime numbers from 0..Integer.MAX_VALUE

Parameters:
args - the program arguments
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if something goes wrong
